articles.author: Maziar Motamedi
articles.title: Assassin’s Creed Mirage: What to know about the ‘Golden Age’ of Baghdad - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The new video game offers a glimpse of Baghdad, once the capital of an empire and the centre of the Islamic world.
articles.content: Whether you dream of holstering a flintlock pistol and sailing through the 18th-century Golden Age of Piracy or leading a clan of Vikings to settle in the fractured Anglo-Saxon kingdoms of the 9th ce… [+6352 chars]
